tgt_original: namo'stu buddhāya viśuddhabodhaye  viśuddhadharmapratibhāsabuddhaye |  saddharmapuṇyopagatānubuddhaye  bhavāgraśūnyāya viśuddhabuddhaye || 1 ||

src_original: aho aho buddhamanakṣatejasaṁ aho aho sāgaramerū |
tgt_original: aho aho buddhamanantatejasaṃ  aho aho sāgaramerugulmam |

src_original: aho aho buddhamanantagocaraṁ ādunvaṁraṁ puṣa-apamivāti dullabhaṁ ||
tgt_original: aho aho buddhamanantagocaram  audumbaraṃ puṣpamivātidurlabham || 2 ||  aho mahākāruṇikastathāgataḥ  aho aho śākyakulasya ketuḥ |  aho praṇamyaḥ sa narendrasūryo

src_original: aho aho kāṇikastathāgataḥ śākyakulatunarendrasūryyāyenedṛśaṁbhāṣita- sutramubhumaṁsarvaṣusatvāmanugrahārtha ||  śa-ānteśa-avaraḥ śākyamunistathāgataḥ satvobhumaḥ gāntapurepraviṣṭhaḥ ||
tgt_original: yenedṛśaṃ bhāṣitasūtramuttamam || 3 ||  anugrahārthaṃ sa hi sarvasattvān  saddharmacaryāmupadiśya nūnam |  śānteśvaraḥ śākyamunistathāgataḥ  sattvottamaḥ śāntapuraṃ praviṣṭaḥ || 4 ||

src_original: śunyā-eva kāyāstabha śvakātāṁ vidhara śūnyādvipakṣekanāṁ te sarva dharmmāḥ prakṛtiśvaśunyāḥ satvāpiśūnyāḥ manūjājūvidyata |
tgt_original: śūnyāśca kāyāstvatha śrāvakāṇāṃ  śūnyā vihārā dvipadottamānām || 5 ||  te sarvadharmā prakṛtiśca śūnyā  sattvā hi śūnyā nahi jātu vidyate || 6 ||

src_original: nitpajva nityatrya jinaṁsmarā mi nityatrca śovijinasya darśaṇaṣaṣa satataṁca nityaprini ciṁkū sambūddha pūṇyasmaca darśanārtha ṣaṣa skāpthe ha nityaṁ dharaṇīka (ṣa)  jāna ati thoka ekosmi jinaraspadarśaṇe odanta kāruṇṣa dvinajaghara tvaṁ-atithoka nṛjbā smisūgata syadarśaṇe ||
tgt_original: nityaṃ ca nityaṃ ca jinaṃ smarāmi  nityaṃ ca śocāmi jinasya darśanam |  nityaṃ ca nityaṃ praṇidhiṃ karomi  saṃbuddhapūjyasya ca darśanārtham || 7 ||

src_original: ṇe prajñāya nāṁkarū saṁgha nāyakaḥ davā disedarśaṇa somyarū paṁtvayā hitā tā jagade vadethitaḥ śūnyā śvakāyasta tha śrāvakā nā-āṁkā śanutyā gagaṇa sva- bhāvā ||
tgt_original: dadāhi me darśanatoyaśītalam |  sattvāḥ satṛṣṇāstava rūpadarśane  prahlādayainān karuṇājalena || 9 ||  kāruṇyabhāvaṃ kuru nātha nāyaka  dadāhi me darśanaṃ saumyarūpam |
